validation.alpha-spaces: The field {value} may only contain alphabetical characters and spaces.
validation.valid-email: The field {value} must be valid email

validation.country-exclude: Due to restrictions, we do not accept users from this location
validation.accept-tos: You must accept the Terms of Service

home.listen: Listen to all music around the world!
home.description: Create your best music playlist see and listen to every music playlist from all people in the world

about.title: MUSICvPINIA is a web app for listening to music, this web is open source and can be used by anyone, it was created as a learning tool for me and others to understand more about Vuejs3
